title: Can money and planning stop future flooding in Europe?
contentencoded:
Residents of Germany, Austria, the Czech Republic and beyond are still wading through high waters today. Severe flooding has led to the deaths of at least 24 people.

The BBC's Steve Evans joins Marketplace Morning Report host David Branccio from Berlin with the latest.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, June 11, 2013
teaser: Residents of Germany, Austria, the Czech Republic and beyond are still wading through high waters today. Severe flooding has led to the deaths of at least 24 people.
